content.text:
# Parameshwar Hivrale

| yearsactive        = 2014–present
| spouse             = Shirisha
| children           = Eshwar and Shivansh .
| mother             = Lakshmi Bai
| father             = Bhujanga Rao Patil
| signature          = Parmeshwar.png
}}
Parameshwar Hivrale (born 28 June 1991) is an Indian actor and film director who works in Telugu cinema. Best known for roles in Chiru Godavalu and Jathiya Rahadari, Hivrale is also making his directorial debut with the pan-India biopic Gummadi Narsaiah, about the legendary tribal leader and legislator.
Early life
Parameshwar Hivrale was born in Kamareddy, Telangana, India. His father, Bhujanga Rao Patil, worked as a lorry driver, and his mother is Lakshmi Bai. He has two siblings, Rameshwar Rao Patil and Sainath Rao Patil Hivrale. Hivrale completed his B.Tech at Vijay Institute of Technology and Science and also studied filmmaking. He married Shirisha in 2018 and has two children.
Career
Hivrale entered the Telugu film industry, debuting with Chiru Godavalu (2015), produced by Annapurna College of Film and Media students. He subsequently starred in films such as Kumari 18+ (2016), Lavanya with Love Boys (2017), Jathiya Rahadari (2021), Daari (2022), and Aakasha Deshana (2018).
He earned recognition for portraying versatile roles, notably lead characters in drama and action films. The role of Yodha in Kumari 18+ gained him the nickname “Yodha” among fans. Hivrale was nominated for Best Actor at the Filmfare Awards South for Jathiya Rahadari in 2021.
He is now turning director. His behind-the-screen debut is for a pan-India film titled Gummadi Narsaiah, an eponymous biopic on the life of the tribal leader Gummadi Narsaiah, a five-time MLA from Yellandu, Bhadradri-Kothagudem district. He spent over 26 months researching Narsaiah’s life.
Media and Public Presence
There were rumors about Hivrale’s involvement in the reality television series Bigg Boss Telugu. He publicly denied reports of being part of recent seasons, clarifying that he was never associated with the show.
